member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ExposureEffect
member.summary: Increases or decreases the exposure of an image.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Exposure effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ExposureEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ExposureEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ExposureEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Exposure effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ExposureEffect.Exposure
member.summary: How much to increase or decrease the exposure of the image. Default value 0, range -2 to 2.
